ygData.subject: Re: DeathSteel/the Patrol is back
ygData.msgSnippet: Tyrael studied the projected area. Tyrael: You re right, Synergy. Kaiser, take someone with you and go greet this guest. Not Deathsteel, though. I must talk

Tyrael studied the projected area.

Tyrael: You're right, Synergy. Kaiser, take someone with you and go
greet this guest. Not Deathsteel, though. I must talk with him in
private for now.

He motioned the dragon to come near to him.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Synergy::
> 
> "Sir Flashy Dot looks like he's trying to get our attention," Synergy 
> points out, lumbering over to the table for a better look.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > ::Kaiser::
> >        He taps a few keys bringing up a hologram map over the 
> center table.  
> > The signature of the unknown soldier flashes just outside the 
> defensive 
> > perimeter.  "He's there.  And since I don't know who he is I deem 
> him Sir 
> > Flashy Dot."
